verses.name: Mark 5:25
verses.text: And a certain woman, which had an issue of blood twelve years,

verses.name: Mark 5:26
verses.text: And had suffered many things of many physicians, and had spent all that she had, and was nothing bettered, but rather grew worse,

verses.name: Mark 5:27
verses.text: When she had heard of Jesus, came in the press behind, and touched his garment.

verses.name: Mark 5:28
verses.text: For she said, If I may touch but his clothes, I shall be whole.

verses.name: Mark 5:29
verses.text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague.
